reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor! His lectures are clear and engaging. Highly recommend.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Good explanations, but sometimes the material is too advanced.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: The professor is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: She explains concepts well but can be strict with grading.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Fantastic lecturer and very approachable. I learned a lot!

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are too fast-paced and difficult to follow.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Average professor. Some lectures are interesting, others are not.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Her classes are very interactive and she cares about students' success.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Good professor, but the material can be challenging to grasp.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Engaging and insightful. She encourages creative thinking.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Decent lecturer, but his exams are very difficult.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Incredible passion for the subject and it shows in her teaching.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the grading is quite tough.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: The course content is good, but the professor's delivery is monotonous.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've had. Very helpful and knowledgeable.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: She knows her stuff, but her teaching style can be hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Great at connecting theory to real-world applications.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and very encouraging.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Difficult to understand and doesn't explain concepts well.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Challenging, but you learn a lot if you put in the effort.
